Why this works

Live Permit Data

English + LA‑style Spanish messages and phone scripts. We can also canvas or door‑drop locally.

Leads never go cold. Automated texting picks up after hours and books time on your calendar.

Simple proof you can forward: watched • contacted • site visits • booked estimates.

FAQ

What if my area has few permits?

We expand radius and add adjacent jurisdictions (LADBS, EPIC‑LA, Long Beach, Pasadena, Glendale, etc.).

Can you help with door hangers or canvassing?

Yes. Add‑on: we generate a route and provide print‑ready materials; local door‑drop available in SGV/Eastside.

How soon can we start?

Same day for LA/SGV. You’ll get your first list by 6pm today if you sign before 2pm.

Who is this best for?

Owners/estimators in roofing, HVAC (RTUs), and restoration who want bigger jobs without paying for junk leads.

Guarantee terms (plain‑English)

• Pilot length is 14 days from kickoff email. • You agree to attempt contact on 10+ matched permits with 1–2 attempts each. • We deliver daily SMS + CSV by 6pm with “hot” badges for permits filed <24h. • If 0–1 estimates are booked in 14 days, we refund in full. • Exclusions: unreachable/invalid numbers don’t count toward the 10 attempts; obvious spam/duplicates are removed. • Capacity is limited by territory to keep results strong.
